document.full_text: a looming government shutdown would be felt thousands of miles away by u.s. troops in afghanistan and iraq and there could be a high political cost for the lawmakers who let it happen.
document.title: u.s. troops are political dynamite in budget battle
lines_and_colors: a looming government shutdown would be felt thousands of miles away by u.s. troops in afghanistan and iraq and there could be a high political cost for the lawmakers who let it happen.
